feed.title: Formbricks Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Adds SAML SSO auth using boxyHQ jackson for self-hosters by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4799
  • feat: adds Is set and Is not set operator for hidden fields in logic editor by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4785
  • feat: optional back button by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4813
  • chore: Upgrade helm chart by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4808
  • chore: add api v2 draft docs by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4783
  • chore: exclude test files from coverage report by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4831
  • chore: bump version to 3.3.0 by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4834
  • docs: Fix formatting and other small tweaks by @salim-b in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4798
  • docs: Update license page by @mintlify in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4827
  • docs: Update menu by @mintlify in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4793
  • docs: add smtp configuration page for self-hosters by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4833
  • docs: add suspense to RN by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4801
  • docs: adds query param in single-use-id docs by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4811
  • docs: fix images by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4800
  • docs: kubernetes by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4830
  • docs: update kubernetes deployment page by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4835
  • fix(filter-dropdown): added the search filter in filter dropdown by @gauravsingh94 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4812
  • fix: Tweak progress bar by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4820
  • fix: a11y in file upload by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4742
  • fix: branch source name by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4825
  • fix: cached service in attributes endpoint by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4728
  • fix: current branch name by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4823
  • fix: hidden field summary row key by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4821
  • fix: local docker image build by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4758
  • fix: oauth docs formatting by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4807
  • fix: removed remove-unused flag by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4814
  • fix: survey placement and close on click outside by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4745
  • fix: surveys package api calls and styling by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4826
  • fix: tolgee flow by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4765
  • fix: tolgee tweaks by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4809

New Contributors

  • @gauravsingh94 made their first contribution in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4812

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.2.0...v3.3.0

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.3.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: update sonar-config to properly scan apps/web by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4844
  • fix: sonarqube action not running in merge queue by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4861
  • chore: Remove lib dependency from survey package by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4767
  • fix: variables initialization in logic editor preview by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4819
  • docs: Release test environment docs by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4842
  • docs: update API intro and key management docs by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4841
  • docs: adds email followup docs by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4858
  • chore: bump version to v3.3.1 by @github-actions in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4873

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.3.0...v3.3.1

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: @formbricks/react-native v2.1.0 release by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4927
  • feat: Android & iOS SDK by @vaxi87 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4871
  • feat: Mobile SDK unit tests and Readme files by @vaxi87 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4892
  • feat: OIDC name fields added by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4872
  • feat: introduce updated helm chart by @d3vb0ox in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4896
  • feat: new management api crud endpoint for responses by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4716
  • feat: open telemetry for prometheus by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4922
  • feat: possibility to set mail from name by @IllimarR in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4864
  • feat: pt-PT translations by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4874
  • feat: surveys package integration with v2 apis by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4882
  • fix: Actions for contributors by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4905
  • fix: Address/Contact question accessibility by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4884
  • fix: Apply security best practices by @step-security-bot in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4876
  • fix: Update tolgee.yml by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4928
  • fix: added the test-key reference back by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4883
  • fix: click outside is working even if the placement is not center by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4925
  • fix: delete webhook button visibility by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4862
  • fix: file input should not allow duplicate files by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4900
  • fix: fix except last by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4942
  • fix: improve multiple choice question summary calculation by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4829
  • fix: logo on follow up email by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4837
  • fix: removed completed surveys from survey list in integrations by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4838
  • fix: removed link survey identification from share modal by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4898
  • fix: signup vulnerability by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4859
  • fix: smtp missing logs by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4917
  • fix: spacing tweaks by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4913
  • fix: survey autoclose on inactivity fix by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4916
  • fix: survey display and card width by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4937
  • fix: survey preview stuck in sending by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4941
  • fix: surveys pkg android file uploads by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4869
  • fix: typo in email by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4880
  • fix: update instructions and docs link by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4921
  • fix: update project config navbar + wording by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4918
  • chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 2 directories with 1 update by @dependabot in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4926
  • chore(deps-dev): bump esbuild from 0.25.0 to 0.25.1 in the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory by @dependabot in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4911
  • chore: add bug label to new bug issues by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4929
  • chore: add licenses to ios and android SDK by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4893
  • chore: prepare 3.4.0 release by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4950
  • docs: activepieces docs for self hosters by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4891

New Contributors

  • @vaxi87 made their first contribution in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4871
  • @victorvhs017 made their first contribution in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4883
  • @step-security-bot made their first contribution in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4876
  • @d3vb0ox made their first contribution in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4896
  • @IllimarR made their first contribution in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4864

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.3.1...v3.4.0

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.4.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore(env): add new env variables by @d3vb0ox in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4959
  • chore(terraform): fix by @d3vb0ox in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4963
  • fix: google sheet integration error message by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4899
  • fix: updated docker file with redis and minio containers by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4909
  • fix: Fix Android build setting by @vaxi87 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4967
  • docs: tweak docs for sso by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4974
  • docs: Remove duplicate titles for better SEO by @harshsbhat in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4962
  • fix: changed 'Download example CSV'-link to a button by @jakobsitory in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4975
  • chore(infra-updates): updates and fixes to helm chart & terraform modules by @d3vb0ox in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4976
  • fix: Harden GitHub Actions by @step-security-bot in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4982
  • feat: optional cron jobs check by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4966
  • chore: determine formbricks version on release by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4985

New Contributors

  • @jakobsitory made their first contribution in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4975

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.4.0...v3.4.1

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Android build fixes by @vaxi87 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4984
  • feat: add custom TTL for cache records by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4912
  • docs: Missing page descriptions. by @harshsbhat in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4980
  • feat: added qr code feature by @Paribesh01 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4951
  • fix(helm-chart): missing envFrom when using secret.enabled by @d3vb0ox in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4992
  • fix: handling invalid csv files by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4991
  • chore: Refactored the intercom next public env variable and added test files by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4960
  • chore: js-core sdk refactor by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4815
  • chore: updates to aws cloud resources by @d3vb0ox in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4996

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.4.1...v3.5.0
